No, it works if I turn off class reloading.

What does this mean?  Is there a workaround?

Thanks,
Bret

-----Original Message-----
From: Erik Hanson [mailto:ehanson@...]
Sent: Friday, October 26, 2001 12:31 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] jUnit bug? textui - no errors, gui - errors.


"Bret Waldow" <Bret.Waldow@...> wrote:
> I have found a case where jUnit will run a test successfully if I use the
> text ui, but error out if I use either of the guis.  The error shows up as
a
> nullPointerException in my code.

Does this still happen if you turn off class reloading in the GUI
testrunners?


Erik
